name: GreatLike Media
description:
We build new websites from scratch, redesign existing sites, and build forums, blogs and e-commerce sites.
We understand quality web design and what it takes to achieve good website rankings. We understand that the user experience is the most important thing, and we look to achieve that on every project without sacrificing the best search engine optimization practices.Â 

When clients are impressed with your website, they will view your site positively. Not only do we help drive traffic to your site, but we also help convert the traffic into phone calls and leads. Every site we build has analytics to view your website statistics including the number of visitors, how they found your site, and what pages were viewed. Great design, strong user experience, well-written copy, and search engine rankings are all key aspects in the websites we build.
